name: web basic
body:
### Web:Basic
* Enjoy the a series of challenges with your web analysis skills.
* Related topics including **"client side validation"**, **"cookie"**


***
* To use this challenge sequence, please make sure you have set up the server [framework](https://github.com/nsslab-yin/SRCTF), then follow the instructions to import the challenge contents.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
